metadata.synopsis: Actress Jaime (Kim Cattrall) is about to get married, so her friend Georgina (Lora Zane) throws a sleepover party to celebrate. The group includes Marcy (Cynthia Stevenson) and competitive sisters Jill (Dana Delany) and Rachel (Laila Robins). Although the five of them have been friends since childhood, their lives now are very different, so they discuss their hopes, fears and fantasies during the party. Meanwhile, the jealous Chris (Olivia d'Abo), Georgina's lover, sulks in the bedroom.

reviews: Kim Cattrall's encounter with a young delivery man is almost alone worth the price of admission.
